## SSH keys

Wanna give me access to your server? Here are the SSH keys to add:

```none
ssh-rsa 
ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIOSmB3TyA2uwJzlLo1D9asCMQHlmCPgVooWcpaOj5moZ
```

I control [other SSH keys as well](https://github.com/syvb.keys) but I only use those for authenticating to specific servers.

## Commit signing

I don't yet sign all of my Git commits, but I am able to sign some!

I use these SSH keys for signing Git commits:
```none
sk-ssh-ed25519@openssh.com AAAAGnNrLXNzaC1lZDI1NTE5QG9wZW5zc2guY29tAAAAIAHOKVATlTKAdQFVrpLi+4JKPSFIPeOUbN2E8qf19aJoAAAABHNzaDo=
```

Some of my commits are signed with [GitHub's GPG key](https://github.com/web-flow.gpg); commits with my email address that are GPG signed by GitHub were authored by me.
